channel.title: consumer behavior on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in consumer behavior on FinanClub

item.title: AFRM
item.description: score:-37 Chances: Affirm shares soar on higher-than-expected forecast as delinquencies decline. Affirm’s strong performance is attributed to growth in customer transaction volumes. Affirm is well-positioned to harness changes in consumer behavior, according to the CFO. Affirm’s stock pops following analyst note on Debit+ card, indicating market optimism.

item.title: KR
item.description: score:28 Chances: Kroger’s potential acquisition of Albertsons to address pharmacy deserts and provide better access to medicines could improve its social impact and customer reach. Competing with dominant retailers like Walmart, Costco, and Amazon could drive Kroger’s motivation to merge with Albertsons for increased size and scale.
